task.title: Avocado Toast
task.shortdesc: Avocado toast is so trendy right now and allows you to come up with new twists and variations on the original.

taskbody.prereq:
This recipe requires a skillet and a knife. You will also need the following ingredients:
6 oz baby portobello mushrooms, washed and sliced
1 1/2 Tbsp olive oil
1 avocado Peel back the stem of the avocado to check for ripeness. If it comes away easily and is green underneath it is ripe and ready to eat.
1 lime, halved
optional: chili flakes to taste
2 slices of bread

step.cmd: Add the oil to a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add in the sliced mushrooms and saut√© for 8-12 minutes or until golden brown, stirring occasionally but not too often

substep.cmd: Grip the avocado gently on one side with one hand. With a sharp knife, cut the avocado lengthwise around the pit
Gently tap the pit with a knife with enough force so that the knife edge wedges into the pit, but not so hard as to cut all the way through it
With the edge of the knife, twist the pit out of the avocado and discard

step.cmd: Add the flesh of the avocado to a bowl along with the juice of one lime.
Use a fork to mash the avocado and season with salt and pepper and chili flakes (optional)

step.note: Check out this list of breads to be sure that you're buying vegan.
